learning_objective: Use public domain or creative commons media, and refrain from copying or using material created by others without permission.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is creating an educational video about the order of operations in mathematics. They decide to include a catchy song by a famous artist in their video to make it more engaging for the viewers. Which of the following actions by Alex would NOT be respecting the rights of the artist?",
    "Answer1": "Alex decides to reproduce the song on their own and includes it in the video.",
    "Answer2": "Alex credits the artist for the song in their video.",
    "Answer3": "Alex asks the artist for permission to use the song in the video.",
    "Answer4": "Alex uses a karaoke version of the song and credits the karaoke channelvfor the music in their video.",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "Reproducing the song without the permission of the artist is a violation of the artist's intellectual property rights. Even if Alex recreates the song on their own"
}
